<span id="robbing-atms"></span>
= Robbing ATMs =

Robbing an ATM in Reveille is illegal and could result in jail time. It could also result with you having an extra $500.

<span id="locations"></span>
== Locations ==

There are 12 ATMs to rob from in Redmont.

The locations include - Reveille Airport - Reveille Animal Shelter - Reveille Train Station - Inside the University - Outside the University - 2 in Oakridge - Capital Police Department - DOC Building - Convention Center - RNA Plaza - Zoo

They are all marked on [https://map.democracycraft.net/#Reveille;flat;2632,64,3860;0 Dynmap] with a symbol like this: [[File:https://i.imgur.com/j9DJo1d.png|Image]]

<span id="how-it-works"></span>
== How it Works ==

When you approach an ATM, right click the computer monitor.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/NPfGOsO.png|Image]]

</div>
A GUI will pop up with 3 options; you choose one.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/h2bwphT.png|Image]]

</div>
If you chose the incorrect one, you will get a message that tells you you failed and will have to wait 2 hours to try again.

If you chose the correct one, a new GUI will pop up with 21 options; you choose 1.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/bnTPDzh.png|Image]]

</div>
If you chose the incorrect one, you will get a message that tells you you failed and will have to wait 2 hours to try again.

If you chose the correct one, you will get $500!

Police will be notified that you robbed an ATM.
